entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
